SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
The AbstractDAO class is a generic class that provides basic CRUD operations for database entities.
Client
The Client class represents a client in the system.
ClientBLL
The ClientBLL class handles the business logic for Client operations.
ClientDAO
The ClientDAO class is a data access object (DAO) that provides CRUD operations for the Client entity.
ClientsPage
The ClientsPage class represents the GUI for managing clients.
ConnectionFactory
The ConnectionFactory class is responsible for managing database connections.
Log
The Log class represents a log entry in the system.
LogBLL
The LogBLL class handles the business logic for Log operations.
LogDAO
The LogDAO class provides methods for accessing and manipulating log entries in the database.
LogsPage
The LogsPage class represents the GUI for managing logs.
MenuPage
The MenuPage class represents the main menu of the Order Management System.
OrderBLL
The OrderBLL class handles the business logic for Order operations.
OrderDAO
The OrderDAO class is a data access object (DAO) that provides CRUD operations for the Orders entity.
Orders
The Orders class represents an order in the system.
OrdersPage
The OrdersPage class represents the GUI for managing orders.
Product
The Product class represents a product in the system.
ProductBLL
The ProductBLL class handles the business logic for Product operations.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class is a data access object (DAO) that provides CRUD operations for the Product entity.
ProductsPage
The ProductsPage class represents the GUI for managing products.
TableBLL
The TableBLL class provides methods for generating table headers and populating tables with data using reflection.
